The Liverpool loanee has quickly shown his quality in League One, scoring twice in his first five games, the latest of which was a winner against Morecambe on Tuesday night.
Bradley admitted to some… [+1977 chars]

articles.author: Jack Lusby
articles.title: Luis Diaz sums up Liverpool’s team spirit in defiant 6-word message - This Is Anfield
articles.description: Defiant stuff from Lucho!
articles.content:
Few played as big a role in Liverpool’s fightback after going a man down against Crystal Palace than Luis Diaz, who has summed up the squad’s team spirit.
